snippet: Israel and several Arab countries should work together to rebuild the Gaza Strip while disarming Hamas militants who rule the territory, Israel's finance minister said Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Israel Calls on Region to Rebuild, Disarm Gaza
headline.main: Israel Calls on Region to Rebuild, Disarm Gaza

lead_paragraph: Israel and several Arab countries should work together to rebuild the Gaza Strip while disarming Hamas militants who rule the territory, Israel's finance minister said Sunday.
